General.Name: Shandong Laiwu Jinlei Wind Power Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Jinlei Technology Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells wind turbine spindles, and various castings and forgings in China and internationally. Its activities include casting, ingot preparation, heat treatment, machining, coating, and other processes, as well as provision of purification technology. The company was formerly known as Shandong Laiwu Jinlei Wind Power Technology Co., Ltd. Jinlei Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Jinan, China.

1.Name: Ms. Li  Zhou
1.Title: CFO, Sec. of the Board & Non-Independent Director
